alert.note: Alert for Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tippah, northern Benton, northwestern Alcorn, southeastern Hardeman and southwestern McNairy Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 221 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Snow Lake Shores, or 13 miles east of Holly Springs, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Hill Pond State Park, Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Pocahontas, Theo, Walnut, Middleton, Ashland, Falkner, Rogers Springs, Chalybeate, Brody, Spring Hill, Lisbon, New Canaan, Essary Springs, Brownfield, Lone Pine, Cypress and Hamilton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
